Title: Relates to public higher education admissions and standardized testing
Summary: Prevents certain public institutions of higher education from using the scholastic aptitude test and ACT assessment in the admissions process on and after the two thousand twenty-six--two thousand twenty-seven academic year for New York resident applicants; requires SUNY and CUNY to create a new standardized test by the two thousand thirty--two thousand thirty-one academic year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to public higher education admissions and standardized testing
